pkgmetadata.longdescription: # flask-shell-ipythonReplace default `flask shell` command by similar command running IPython.## UsageJust install: pip install flask-shell-ipythonAnd here are you go: > flask shell Python 3.5.1 (default, Mar 3 2016, 09:29:07) [GCC 5.3.0] on linux IPython: 5.0.0 App: discharges [debug] Instance: /home/ei-grad/repos/discharges/instance In [1]:
